aboutUsSection.title: About Us
aboutUsSection.paragraph1: LLC “Specresource” is a dynamically developing cable factory. Our main specialization is the production of fire-resistant cables for fire protection systems. We also manufacture heating wire (concrete heating), telephony, and video surveillance.
aboutUsSection.paragraph2: We have assembled a team of qualified professionals in the electrical goods market to implement our key mission: saving lives by producing high-tech and environmentally friendly cable products that meet all safety and operational standards.
aboutUsSection.paragraph3: The main principles of our company are: honest business practices, an individual approach to each client, affordable cable prices, and quality control at every production stage.
aboutUsSection.paragraph4: Caring about product quality, we purchase raw materials only from large suppliers of copper, steel, and plasticizers.
aboutUsSection.paragraph5: Our own laboratory and multi-stage quality control ensure compliance of products with DSTU standards.

contractorRules.title: Contractor Requirements
contractorRules.description: For the implementation of LLC “Specresource”'s rights under Article 312 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation regarding the conclusion and execution of supply contracts, we ask you to provide duly certified copies of the following documents with company seal:
contractorRules.document3: Extract from the Unified State Register of Legal Entities (USRLE)/Individual Entrepreneurs (USREI);
contractorRules.document4: Lease agreement for the actual location;
contractorRules.document5: Decision on appointment of the head (minutes of general meeting of participants or board of directors (shareholders) or decision of sole participant (founder, shareholder));
contractorRules.document6: Order on appointment of the head;
contractorRules.document8: Order or power of attorney for persons authorized to sign contracts and invoices.

paymentRulesSection.title: Payment Terms
paymentRulesSection.paragraph1: Payment is made only by non-cash transfer.
paymentRulesSection.paragraph2: Product shipment occurs only upon 100% prepayment. You can always clarify the amount, terms, and procedure of payment with your personal manager.
paymentRulesSection.paragraph3: Please note that after the expiration of the specified term, the price and availability of products in stock may change. Before paying an overdue invoice, please call your manager and ask for a reissued invoice with up-to-date information. Partial payment invoices are not accepted.

storageRulesSection.title: Storage Conditions
storageRulesSection.paragraph2: We offer a free storage service at our warehouse.
storageRulesSection.paragraph3: Free storage is possible for 10 days including the day of payment. After the specified period, you may use the delivery service or pick up the goods yourself.
storageRulesSection.paragraph4: By purchasing products in advance, you can be sure that all necessary materials will arrive on time, and by using the free storage service, you don't need to worry about temporary storage.
